tuv.seg: Access to children and cohabiting couples
Rochtain ar leanaí i gcás tuismitheoirí comhchónaithe
If you have a right of access to a child, you have the right to spend time with the child and to take the child out for specified periods of time
Má tá ceart rochtana agat ar leanbh, tá ceart agat am a chaitheamh leis an leanbh agus an leanbh á thógáil amach ar feadh tréimhsí ama a luaitear

You may also have the right to have the child reside with and go on holidays with you for a proportion of the school holidays and the right to have the child stay overnight in your house on alternate weekends

D’fhéadfadh an ceart a bheith agat freisin go bhfanadh an leanbh leat agus go rachadh an leanbh ar laethanta saoire leat ar feadh cuid de laethanta saoire na scoile agus go mbeadh an leanbh in ann fanacht thar oíche i do theach gach ré deireadh seachtaine
When the parents of a child separate and they cannot agree on access rights, the courts will decide
Nuair a scarann tuismitheoirí linbh, agus murar féidir leo aontú faoi chearta rochtana, déanfaidh an chúirte an cinneadh
The welfare of the child will be the most important factor
Is é leas an linbh an ghné is tábhachtaí

In general, the courts consider that it is very important for the welfare of a child that it should have a relationship with both its parents, and they are slow to deny access rights to the natural parent of a child

Go ginearálta, bíonn na cúirteanna faoin tuairim go bhfuil sé an-tábhachtach do leas an linbh go mbeadh gaol aige/aici leis an mbeirt tuismitheoirí agus bíonn drogall orthu cearta rochtana a dhiúltú ar thuismitheoir nádúrtha linbh
By law, unmarried mothers are the sole guardians of children born outside of marriage
De réir an dlí, is í an mháthair neamhphósta an caomhnóir aonair do leanbh a rugadh taobh amuigh de phósadh
A father may apply for access whether or not he is a guardian
Féadfaidh athair iarratas a dhéanamh ar rochtain, cibé acu más caomhnóir é nó mura caomhnóir é
He can do this even if his name is not on the child's birth certificate, and even where his application for joint guardianship has been turned down
Féadfaidh sé é seo a dhéanamh, fiú mura bhfuil a ainm ar theastas breithe an linbh, agus fiú sa chás gur diúltaíodh a iarratas ar chomhchaomhnóireacht
If both guardianship and access are being applied for, then separate applications must be made, but both applications will be heard by the court at the same time
Má tá iarratas á dhéanamh ar chaomhnóireacht agus ar rochtain araon, ní mór iarratais ar leith a dhéanamh, ach éisteoidh an chúirt leis an dá iarratas ag an tráth céanna
Unless there are unusual circumstances, the unmarried mother is usually granted custody of her child and the unmarried father is granted access rights
Mura bhfuil cúinsí neamhghnácha ann, tugtar caomhnóireacht an linbh don mháthair neamhphósta de ghnáth, agus tugtar cearta rochtana don athair neamhphósta
If your same-sex relationship breaks down, you may wish to continue to have contact with your former partner's child
Má chliseann ar do chaidreamh comhghnéis, seans gur mhaith leat teagmháil a bheith fós agat le páiste d’iarpháirtí

Section 55 of the Children and Family Relationships Act 2015 has amended the Guardianship of Infants Act 1964 so that a person with whom a child resides or has previously resided can apply to the District Court for access to the child

Tá Alt 55 den Acht um Leanaí agus Cóngais Teaghlaigh, 2015 tar éis an tAcht um Chaomhnóireacht Naíon 1964 a leasú ionas gur féidir le duine a bhfuil leanbh ina chónaí/cónaí leo, nó a raibh ina chónaí/cónaí leo roimhe sin, iarratas a dhéanamh ar an gCúirt Dúiche chun rochtain a fháil ar an leanbh
Section 9 of the Children Act 1997 amended the Guardianship of Infants Act 1964 so that a relative, such as a grandparent, can apply to the District Court for access
Rinne Acht 9 d’Acht na Leanaí 1997 an tAcht um Chaomhnóireacht Naíon 1964 a leasú ionas gur féidir le gaol, ar nós seantuismitheora, iarratas ar rochtain a dhéanamh ar an gCúirt Dúiche
The court can impose an enforcement order if you have been been unreasonably denied the access the court granted you
Is féidir leis an gcúirt ordú forghníomhaithe a chur i bhfeidhm má diúltaíodh go míréasúnta an rochtain a dheonaigh an chúirt duit
• You getting compensatory time with the child
• Am chúiteach le do leanbh
• Your expenses being reimbursed
• Aisíocaíocht maidir le do chostais
• One or both of you attending parenting programmes, family counselling or receiving information on mediation
• Duine amháin agaibh, nó an bheirt agaibh, a chur chuig cláir thuismitheoireachta nó chuig comhairleoireacht teaghlaigh, nó eolas a fháil maidir le hidirghabháil
Treoir, the National Federation of Services for Unmarried Parents and their Children, provides information on access and custody on its website
Tá teacht ar eolas maidir le rochtain agus coimeád ar láithreán gréasáin Treoir, an Cónaidhm Náisiúnta Seirbhísí le haghaidh Tuismitheoirí Neamhphósta agus a Leanaí
The Courts Service has information on applying for access on its website
Tá eolas maidir le cur isteach ar rochtain ar láithreán gréasáin na Seirbhíse Cúirteanna
Contact your local District Court for further information on how to apply for access
Déan teagmháil le do Chúirt Dúiche áitiúil chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil maidir le hiarratas ar rochtain a dhéanamh
It is always advisable to get legal advice and representation, however, you are entitled to represent yourself
Moltar i gcónaí chun comhairle agus ionadaíocht dlí a fháil, ach tá tú i dteideal ionadaíocht a dhéanamh duit féin, áfach
The Law Society has a directory of solicitors' firms which you can search for a solicitor in your area
Tá ag an Dlí-Chumann eolaire de ghnóthais aturnaetha inar féidir leat cuardach a dhéanamh le haghaidh aturnae i do cheantar
To enquire whether you are eligible for Legal Aid, contact your nearest law centre
Lena fhiosrú an bhfuil tú i dteideal Cúnamh Dlí a fháil, téigh i dteagmháil leis an ionad dlí is gaire duit
The law centre staff will assess your means and advise on financial eligibility
Déanfaidh foireann an ionaid dlí measúnú ar do mhaoin agus tabharfaidh moladh duit faoi theidlíocht airgeadais
Legal Aid is not free and everyone must pay a contribution towards costs
Níl Cúnamh Dlí saor in aisce agus ní mór do gach duine ranníocaíocht a íoc i dtreo na gcostas
Download an application form for Legal Services (pdf) and bring this with you to your nearest law centre
Íoslódáil foirm iarratais le haghaidh Seirbhísí Dlí (pdf) agus tabhair seo leat chuig an ionad dlí is gaire duit
FLAC (Free Legal Advice Centres) is an independent, voluntary organisation that operates a network of legal advice clinics throughout the country
Is eagraíocht neamhspleách, dheonach iad FLAC (Ionaid Comhairle Dlí Saor in Aisce) a fheidhmíonn gréasáin de chlinicí comhairle dlí ar fud na tíre
These clinics are confidential, free of charge and open to all
Tá na clinicí seo rúnda, saor in aisce agus oscailte do gach duine
Contact your nearest Citizens Information Centre for information on FLAC services in your area
Déan teagmháil le d’Ionad Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh áitiúil chun faisnéis a fháil faoi sheirbhísí FLAC i do cheantar áitiúil
FLAC also runs an information and referral line during office hours for basic legal information
Ina theannta sin, tá líne ghutháin faisnéise agus atreoraithe á reáchtáil ag FLAC le linn uaireanta oifige le haghaidh faisnéis bhunúsach dlí
FLAC has produced a series of basic leaflets on various areas of law which may be useful
Chuir FLAC sraith leabhráin bhunúsacha i dtoll a chéile maidir le limistéir éagsúla dlí a d’fhéadfadh bheith áisiúil
These are available from your local Citizens Information Centre and from FLAC or can be downloaded from the FLAC website
Tá fáil orthu seo ó d'Ionad Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh áitiúil agus ó FLAC nó is féidir iad a íoslódáil ó láithreán gréasáin FLAC
The Family Mediation Service can enable couples who have decided to separate to negotiate their own terms of agreement, while addressing the needs and interests of all involved

Is féidir leis an tSeirbhís Idirghabhála Teaghlaigh cabhrú le lánúineacha a rinne a cinneadh chun scaradh óna chéile idirghabháil a dhéanamh ar a dtéarmaí féin aontaithe, agus dul i ngleic le riachtanais agus leas gach duine atá i gceist chomh maith
The service is free
Seirbhís saor in aisce atá inti
Read more about the Family Mediation Service here
Is féidir níos mó a léamh faoin tSeirbhís Idirghabhála Teaghlaigh anseo
